long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share links with friends! Eigen is made to enable social link sharing, like an exclusive hacker news with your friends. Install the extension, login with google, and, when you come across an interesting website, share the link with your friends through Eigen. You’ll also see links shared by your friends in Eigen, so check out what they’ve shared as well. It’s as simple as a shared list of links among your friends. Login and start sharing, reading, and having fun!
